name: uber-clone
description: A full-stack Uber clone application with real-time tracking and booking features

scripts.dev:server: cross-env DEBUG=development:* npm run dev --prefix server
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix client && npm run build --prefix server
scripts.test: npm run test --prefix client && npm run test --prefix server
scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix client && npm run lint --prefix server

author: sumithsaini01@gmail.com Sumith Kumar Saini
